scripts.build: pnpm run format && pnpm run clean && pnpm run compile && pnpm run build:esm && pnpm run build:cjs && pnpm run copy-abi:uni && pnpm run build:types && pnpm run tree-shaking:lib
scripts.copy-abi:uni: cpx "artifacts/contracts/Unidirectional.sol/Unidirectional.json" lib/esm/abi/ && cpx "artifacts/contracts/Unidirectional.sol/Unidirectional.json" lib/cjs/abi/ && cpx "artifacts/contracts/Unidirectional.sol/Unidirectional.json" abi/
scripts.tree-shaking:lib: rimraf lib/cjs/hardhat.config.* lib/esm/hardhat.config.* lib/types/hardhat.config.* lib/cjs/**/*.map lib/esm/**/*.map lib/types/**/*.map
scripts.deploy:uni:polygonAmoy: rimraf ignition/deployments && hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Unidirectional.ts --network polygonAmoy
scripts.deploy:uni:uups:hardhat: rimraf ignition/deployments && hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/UnidirectionalUUPS.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:uni:uups:polygonAmoy: rimraf ignition/deployments && hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/UnidirectionalUUPS.ts --network polygonAmoy
scripts.deploy:token:uups:hardhat: rimraf ignition/deployments && hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenUnidirectionalUUPS.ts --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:token:uups:polygonAmoy: rimraf ignition/deployments && hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenUnidirectionalUUPS.ts --network polygonAmoy
